name: Devfolio — Portfolio Website
description: A personal developer portfolio to showcase projects, skills, and contact info with elegant animations and responsive design.
challenges: Handling responsive animations across devices and optimizing Lighthouse performance score.
future: Add blog support, dark/light toggle, and CMS integration for real-time content updates.

name: ShopSwift — E-commerce Platform
description: A modern e-commerce app with dynamic product listings, shopping cart, Stripe checkout, and user authentication.
challenges: Integrating secure Stripe payments and implementing SSR with real-time product updates.
future: Add admin dashboard, multi-vendor support, and product recommendation engine using AI.

name: ChatterBox — Real-Time Chat App
description: A real-time web chat app with room creation, user login, and instant messaging using sockets.
challenges: Ensuring reliable socket communication with reconnection handling and user presence updates.
future: Implement message history persistence, emoji reactions, and mobile PWA support.
